_header: Right as the dawing ere the day spring
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; Christ, gifts of; sermons, verses in
_description: Christ as light to the world, in a Latin sermon — one couplet

CULKk424.Transcription:
Ryȝth as þe dawynge or þe day spryngSo ȝeue y
                    lyȝth to al maner þyng
